sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { toast, ToastContainer } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import './LoanForm.css'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const LoanForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ Full_Name: '', Address: '', PAN_Number: '', Company_Name: '', Current_Salary: '', Previous_Salary: '', Owns_House: '', Rent_Amount: '', Grocery_Expense: '', Current_EMIs: '', Date_Previous_Hike: '', Date_Next_Hike: '', Bank_Name: '', Credit_Score: '', Number_of_Credit_Cards: '', Total_Credit_Limit: '', Number_of_Loans: '', Employment_Duration: '', Job_Title: '', Bonuses_Allowances: '', Savings: '', Investments: '', Monthly_Expenses: '', Age: '', Education_Level: '', Marital_Status: '', Dependents: '', Loan_Purpose: '', Mall_Visits_Per_Month: '', Mall_Spend_Average: '', Loans: [] }); const bankOptions = [ 'State Bank of India', 'HDFC Bank', 'ICICI Bank', 'Axis Bank', 'Kotak Mahindra Bank', 'Bank of Baroda', 'Punjab National Bank', 'Canara Bank', 'Union Bank of India', 'Indian Bank', 'IndusInd Bank', 'IDFC FIRST Bank', 'Bandhan Bank', 'Yes Bank', 'South Indian Bank', 'Ujjivan Small Finance Bank', 'RBL Bank', 'Federal Bank', 'Lakshmi Vilas Bank', 'Jammu & Kashmir Bank', 'Others' ]; const jobTitleOptions = [ 'Software Engineer', 'Data Analyst', 'Product Manager', 'Financial Analyst', 'Marketing Manager', 'Sales Executive', 'HR Manager', 'Consultant', 'Graphic Designer', 'Project Manager', 'Business Analyst', 'Operations Manager', 'Customer Service Executive', 'Accountant', 'Content Writer', 'Web Developer', 'UX/UI Designer', 'Network Engineer', 'Digital Marketer', 'Administrative Assistant', 'Research Scientist', 'Others' ]; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevFormData => { if (name === 'Owns_House' && value === 'Yes') { return { ...prevFormData, [name]: value, Rent_Amount: '' // Clear Rent_Amount when Owns_House is "Yes" }; } return { ...prevFormData, [name]: value }; }); }; const validateForm = () => { const requiredFields = [ 'Full_Name', 'Address', 'PAN_Number', 'Company_Name', 'Current_Salary', 'Previous_Salary', 'Owns_House', 'Employment_Duration', 'Job_Title', 'Credit_Score', 'Bank_Name', 'Education_Level', 'Marital_Status', 'Dependents', 'Loan_Purpose', 'Age', 'Savings', 'Investments', 'Monthly_Expenses', 'Mall_Visits_Per_Month', 'Mall_Spend_Average' ]; for (const field of requiredFields) { if (formData[field].trim() === '') { return false; // Return false if any required field is empty } } // Ensure the Number_of_Loans field is a positive integer if set const numberOfLoans = parseInt(formData.Number_of_Loans, 10); if (isNaN(numberOfLoans) || numberOfLoans < 0) { return false; } // Check if all loan details are filled if (numberOfLoans > 0) { for (const loan of formData.Loans) { if (loan.EMI.trim() === '' || loan.Tenure.trim() === '') { return false; } } } return true; }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!validateForm()) { toast.error('Please fill out all required fields correctly.'); return; } try { const response = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/predict', formData); const data = response.data; toast.success('Loan application submitted successfully!'); navigate('/result', { state: { resultData: data } }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error making prediction:', error.response ? error.response.data : error.message); toast.error('An error occurred while submitting the application.'); } }; const handleNumberOfLoansChange = (e) => { const numberOfLoans = parseInt(e.target.value, 10); const loans = Array(numberOfLoans).fill({ EMI: '', Tenure: '' }); setFormData(prevFormData => ({ ...prevFormData, Number_of_Loans: e.target.value, Loans: loans })); }; const handleChangeform = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; if (name.startsWith('Loan_')) { const [loanIndex, field] = name.split('_').slice(1); const loans = [...formData.Loans]; if (loanIndex < loans.length) { loans[loanIndex] = { ...loans[loanIndex], [field]: value }; setFormData(prevFormData => ({ ...prevFormData, Loans: loans })); } } else { handleChange(e); } }; return (
{/* Personal Information Section */}

Personal Information

{/* Employment Details Section */}

Employment Details

{/* Financial Information Section */}

Financial Information

{/* Loan Information Section */}

Loan Information

{formData.Number_of_Loans > 0 && ( <> {Array.from({ length: parseInt(formData.Number_of_Loans, 10) }).map((_, index) => (

Loan {index + 1} Details

))} )}
{/* Additional Details Section */}

Additional Details

); }; export default LoanForm;
